greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Fully additive with a(n) = n-1 for n <= 3, and a(p) = 1 + a(A048673(p)) when p is prime > 3 and a(n*m) = a(n) + a(m) when m,n > 1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 13 2020
